LanguageData.VAEWaste_Pestigator.label: pestigator
LanguageData.VAEWaste_Pestigator.description: The Pestigator is a massive and fearsome predator that reigns supreme in the polluted swamps of the rimworld. With its heavily armored form and powerful jaws, it is capable of inflicting massive damage on any opponent. Though slow on land, it is nimble and nearly invisible in water, making it a formidable adversary in its native habitat. The Pestigator is not to be underestimated, as its powerful bite can rip apart its prey with ease. Its insatiable hunger and aggression make it impossible to tame, making it a constant threat to any unfortunate enough to encounter it.
